website_summaries.verdict: A great hydraulic oil filter compatible with a wide range of equipment and vehicles.
pros: Easy set up and install in a broad range of equipment such as lifts and log splitters
The filter is long lasting, so replacements are less frequent than cheaper versions
cons: Not as long lasting as more premium filter options

customer_reviews.title: Log splitter replacement.
customer_reviews.text: This filter is an exact replacement for a Dirtyhands log splitter filter for half the price. Good quality fast service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Landes

customer_reviews.title: Replaced the same numbered Fram filter
customer_reviews.text: Used in on a 35 ton log splitter when I changed the Hydraulic oil. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Larson

customer_reviews.title: Fits MTD 22 ton wood splitter with 5 hp Briggs and Stratton gold series motor
customer_reviews.text: My old filter had some surface rust and was concerned that I might develop a pin hole. So I replaced it with this filter. You will have a small amount of hydraulic oil spill from the old filter so have a rag ready.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Sears Craftsman 27 ton splitter and it fit perfect! And to think Sears wanted $57.85 for the same filter!!! WOW!! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 22 ton power-horse log splitter. Works great no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: OEM Fit for my Troy-Bilt splitter.
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say, except that this was the best price we found for it, especially with the repeat shipping option so we keep a new onw on hand always.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: It fit my MTD log splitter
customer_reviews.text: Its a Fram filter, a well respected brand, worked as it should
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Saved lots over local
customer_reviews.text: A good value, be sure to cross reference the filter you need with the other brands, often you will save lots and how different can the quality of an oil filter be.
customer_reviews.author: Redfield

customer_reviews.title: Replacement hydraulic filter on MTD
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for hydraulic oil filter on MTD wood splitter
customer_reviews.author: ArmC

customer_reviews.title: Quality filter
customer_reviews.text: Matched up the original perfectly. The specs were the same and higher. The price was much lower, overal a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Arbor John

customer_reviews.title: Will fit on a Troy built 33ton splitter
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my Troy bilt 33 ton wood splitter. No leakage. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Fram Hydraulic Filter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Fram because of the brand name. Been using Fram Filters in all of our vehicles and machinery for more than 20 years. Trusted name we can be confident with.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Glad I looked before install
customer_reviews.text: The filter had excess glue inside. Glad I looked before install. It would have ruined my hydraulic system
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a quality hydraulic filter for a good price. Was exactly what I ordered and fit and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement Filter
customer_reviews.text: This hydraulic oil filter fit my 22 ton Huskee log splitter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Fram is junk. Internals collapsed. Purolator or wix or baldwin is best. First pic is of this actual part #, second is a comparism. I'm a farmer and would love to support Fram as they are a local company, but I'm not putting a obviously inferior product on expensive machinery.
customer_reviews.author: tailgator

customer_reviews.title: FITS BRUTE 30 TON log splitter
customer_reviews.text: It is compatible with Brute 30 /25 Ton log splitter compatible with LSP25-09002
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Corleonne

product_meta.title: FRAM P1653A Hydraulic Filter
feature_bullets: Designed to remove harmfull contaminants from your vehicle's system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
